title: Industrial Revolution: Social and Economic Transformation

vocab.definition: Period of major industrialization and technological advancement (1760-1840)
Method of manufacturing using machinery and division of labor
Movement of people from rural areas to cities
Economic system based on private ownership and free markets
Working class who sell their labor for wages

teachingNotes: Analyze both positive and negative effects of industrialization. Connect to modern economic and social issues.

sample.question: What was the period of major industrialization from 1760-1840?

truefalse.question: The factory system used machinery and division of labor.

multiplechoice.question: What is the movement from rural areas to cities called?

fillintheblank.question: The working class who sell their labor are called the ________.

shortanswer.question: How did the Industrial Revolution change social structures?
